actions.name: addmoderator
actions.ricardian_contract: The intent of this action is for the contract owner to add an account to the list of moderators.

actions.name: createblog
actions.ricardian_contract: The intent of this action is to create a new blog record for the signing author. The signer agrees to the Terms of Service found in the "Decentium Terms of Service (DToS)" ricardian clause.

actions.name: delmoderator
actions.ricardian_contract: The intent of this action is for the contract owner to remove an account from the list of moderators.

actions.name: freezeblog
actions.ricardian_contract: The intent of this action is for a moderator to remove a blogs posts from the trending feeds as well as prevent further endorsements and linkbacks to that blog.

actions.name: unfreezeblog
actions.ricardian_contract: The intent of this action is for a moderator to restore a previously frozen blog.
